availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Student at Kentucky University in 1861. By 1863, Theophilus had taken up the teaching profession in Mercer County.

bibl.p: U.S. School Catalogues, Kentucky, Kentucky University, 1861, page 8.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, page 2.
U.S. Civil War Draft Registration Records, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Seventh District, Volume 1, page 74.
Kentucky Death Records, 1852-1964, Death Certificates 1911-1964, 1911-12, film 7016139, certificate 31788.
